FuncDef:
The segment-routing mpls command enables Segment Routing for an OSPF process.
The undo segment-routing mpls command disables Segment Routing for an OSPF process.
By default, Segment Routing is disabled for OSPF processes.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In Segment Routing implementation, an IGP is used to collect network-wide topology information and assign a label to each router. Therefore, Segment Routing must be enabled for the IGP. If OSPF is used as the IGP, run the segment-routing mpls command in the OSPF view to enable Segment Routing.
Prerequisites
Segment Routing has been enabled globally, and opaque LSA has been enabled using the opaque-capability enable command.
Precautions
Segment routing cannot work unless this configuration is done.
